item.title: Let Me Out of Your Net - Egress Testing
item.author: Rob Fuller
item.description: Use-cases: IT Admin, Firewall Admin, or Security staff at a company and want to confirm what ports and protocols are allowed of your network. Pentester that intends to identify ports and protocols that can be used for a pentest to gain C2 outbound. Purple Team testing ports and protocol detection for C2. Egress testing is an exciting problem due to the uniqueness of most networks. You may find fully open networks like those found in many Silicon Valley companies or companies attempting to move to a “Beyond Corp” model.
